Name: Ring
Text: A golden ring, it looks important

Name: Crossbow
Text: Your trusty old evil slaying crossbow of bodacity

Name: Holy Water
Text: Blessed by the order, this potent fluid is devestating to satans servants

Name: Holy Cross
Text: Jesus shield is the best shield against evil

Name: Crossbow Bolts
Text: Just regular bolts. Without them the crossbow is useless

Name: Nitroglycerin
Text: A highly sensitive explosive. Dont shake it too hard.

Name: Ruby
Text: A well cut gem of impressive size.

Name: Mummified Head
Text: A well preserved head of a man. A note attached to it reads 'ROBERT'.
